TopicTitle: KSP has had a black screen with a cursor when opening up

Articles.Content:
KSP has had a black screen with a cursor when opening up, there are no images, nothing. It is just a full black screen with the KSP cursor. I found another post about this issue, but the answer required you to have an NVIDIA graphics card, for which I only have intel-integrated UHD graphics. I don't know if anyone using intel graphics has an answer, or if I should redownload from steam (if I can). This started after I used CurseForge to play with mods, but when I wanted to delete one mod, this happened after relaunching the game and closing it to delete the mod. Same thing. I have been closing KSP, then deleting mods one by one, but nothing happened, until I had reached the end of my mods were then I still had that issue, there were some extra files left behind, but I wasn't sure which ones were necessary and which ones were part of the mods.

I'd recommend using ckan instead of curseforge, ckan is built for KSP and is updated alot.

Also, if you're using mods, definitely make a copy of the game to mess around with, don't put mods on your main steam/ksp install.
